attributes.action: Keep British Summer time as it is with the same relationship to continental time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please ignore the petitions calling for changes to BST. Tinkering with clock time does not change the amount of daylight in the winter. Travelling in the dark in the morning could well be more dangerous if drivers are less alert. Also to change the relationship between UK time and continental time twice a year would cause more confusion.
